description: Sea thrift (Armeria 'Nifty Thrifty') is an amazing low-maintenance plant that will turn any garden into a bright and happy outdoor oasis. Its pink blooms will add a beautiful pop of color throughout the season and quickly form a lovely clump of evergreen mounds with grey-green leaves. Sea thrift will tolerate a wide range of soils and grows well in areas with sunny or partially shaded exposures. This plant species is very drought-tolerant and quite hardy, not requiring much care and maintenance at all. Plus, its deer-resistant! So, if you're looking for a colorful and hardy addition to your garden, look no further than Armeria 'Nifty Thrifty' sea thrift!
